selection_method.title: How do you want to select entities?
selection_method.description:
Choose how you want to select which Home Assistant entities to send to Clarify.io.

{entities_available} entities are available in your system.

quick_setup.title: Quick Setup (Recommended)
quick_setup.description:
Select entities by priority level. This is the quickest way to get started.

**High Priority**: Energy, temperature, CO2, power consumption, air quality
**Medium Priority**: High + light levels, motion sensors, sound levels
**Low Priority**: All entities including binary sensors

priority_selection.title: Select by Priority Level
priority_selection.description:
Entities are automatically classified by data value:

â€¢ **High Priority**: Critical metrics (energy, temperature, CO2, etc.)
â€¢ **Medium Priority**: Useful data (light, speed, signal strength)
â€¢ **Low Priority**: All trackable entities including binary sensors

data_description.min_priority: Only track entities at or above this priority level

domain_selection.title: Select by Domain
domain_selection.description:
Choose which Home Assistant domains to track. Each domain represents a type of entity.

Common domains:
â€¢ **sensor**: Temperature, humidity, power, etc.
â€¢ **climate**: Thermostats and HVAC systems
â€¢ **binary_sensor**: Motion, door, window sensors (converted to 0/1)

data_description.domains: Select one or more domains to track
data_description.refine_priority: After selecting domains, choose priority level

device_class_selection.title: Select by Device Class
device_class_selection.description:
Choose specific types of sensors by device class. This is the most precise way to select entities.

{device_class_count} device classes found in your system.

**Recommended**: temperature, humidity, power, energy, voltage, current, carbon_dioxide

data_description.device_classes: Select specific sensor types to track

entity_selection.title: Manual Entity Selection
entity_selection.description:
Manually select specific entities to track. This gives you complete control.

{entity_count} trackable entities found (showing first {showing}).

**Tip**: Use bulk selection methods (domain, device class, priority) for easier setup with many entities.

data_description.entities: Select specific entities you want to track

advanced_filtering.title: Advanced Filtering
advanced_filtering.description:
Use regular expressions and patterns to precisely control entity selection.

**Include patterns**: Match entities to track (e.g., `sensor\..*_temperature`)
**Exclude patterns**: Match entities to exclude (e.g., `sensor\.test_.*`)
**Exclude entities**: Comma-separated list of entity IDs to exclude

**Examples**:
â€¢ All temperature sensors: `sensor\..*_temperature`
â€¢ Kitchen and bedroom sensors: `sensor\.(kitchen|bedroom)_.*`
â€¢ All power/energy: `sensor\..*_(power|energy)`

data_description.include_pattern: Regular expression to match entity IDs to include
data_description.exclude_pattern: Regular expression to match entity IDs to exclude
data_description.exclude_entities: Specific entity IDs to exclude, comma-separated

batch_settings.title: Batch Processing Settings
batch_settings.description:
Configure how data is batched and sent to Clarify.io.

**Batch Interval**: How often to send accumulated data
**Batch Size**: Maximum data points before automatic send

**Recommendations**:
â€¢ Small homes: 300s interval, 100 batch size
â€¢ Medium homes: 180s interval, 200 batch size
â€¢ Large homes: 120s interval, 500 batch size

data_description.batch_interval: How often to send batched data to Clarify (60-3600 seconds)
data_description.max_batch_size: Maximum number of data points to accumulate before sending (10-1000)

entity_filters.title: Entity Filtering
entity_filters.description:
Adjust which entities are tracked based on priority, domain, and device class.

**Priority Levels**:
â€¢ High: Energy, temperature, CO2, air quality
â€¢ Medium: High + light, motion, sound
â€¢ Low: All entities including binary sensors

Changes take effect after restarting the integration.

data_description.min_priority: Only track entities at or above this priority level

advanced_filters.title: Advanced Filtering
advanced_filters.description:
Use patterns and exclusions for precise entity control.

**Include Patterns**: Regex patterns for entities to include (comma-separated)
**Exclude Patterns**: Regex patterns for entities to exclude (comma-separated)
**Exclude Entities**: Specific entity IDs to exclude (comma-separated)

**Pattern Examples**:
â€¢ `sensor\..*_temperature` - All temperature sensors
â€¢ `sensor\.(kitchen|bedroom)_.*` - Sensors in specific rooms
â€¢ `sensor\..*_(power|energy)` - All power and energy sensors

Changes take effect after restarting the integration.

data_description.include_patterns: Regular expression patterns to match entity IDs to include
data_description.exclude_patterns: Regular expression patterns to match entity IDs to exclude
